open curly brackets table attributes columnalign left end attributes row cell x subscript C Đ end subscript plus x subscript C T end subscript equals fraction numerator negative 2 over denominator 3 end fraction less than 0 space left parenthesis 2 right parenthesis end cell row cell x subscript C Đ end subscript. x subscript C T end subscript equals m over 3 space left parenthesis 3 right parenthesis end cell end table close
